sourcesContent:
<template>
  <section class="add">
    <el-form ref="form" :model="form" label-width="100px">
    <el-header content="推荐收集方法">  
      <el-page-header  >
      </el-page-header>
    </el-header>
       <el-main>
      <el-form-item label="IP">
        <el-input v-model="form.IP"></el-input>
      </el-form-item>
      <el-form-item label="策略">
        <el-input v-model="form.tactics"></el-input>
      </el-form-item>
      <el-form-item>
        <el-button type="primary" @click="showClass=true">推荐收集方法</el-button>
      </el-form-item>
      <el-form-item label="推荐方式" v-model="showClass" v-if="showClass==true">
    <el-input type="textarea" v-model="form.desc"></el-input>
    <el-button type="primary" @click="next()">下一步</el-button>
  </el-form-item>
       </el-main>
      
    </el-form>
     
  </section>
  
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      form: { //表单数据初始化
        IP: null,
        tactics: null,
        desc: '11111'
      },
       showClass: false  
    };
  },
  methods: {
    next(){
    this.$router.push({path: '/Recommended vulnerability scanning methods'})
    },
    onSubmit() {
      let examDate = this.formatTime(this.form.examDate)
      this.form.examDate = examDate.substr(0,10)
      this.$axios(`/api/examManagePaperId`).then(res => {
        this.form.paperId = res.data.data.paperId + 1 
        this.$axios({
          url: '/api/exam',
          method: 'post', 
          data: {
            ...this.form
          }
        }).then(res => {
          if(res.data.code == 200) {
            this.$message({
              message: '数据添加成功',
              type: 'success'
            })
            this.$router.push({path: '/selectExam'})
          }
        })
      })
    },
    
  }
};
</script>
<style>
.add {
  padding: 0px 40px;
  width: 400px;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, .12), 0 0 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, .04);
  height:500px;
}
</style>
